title: How to Play Hide and Seek Tiggy

steps.headline: Choose an "it" and the people who will hide.
steps.description: The "it" person is the person who must find the hiders in their hiding spots, but who now has more of a job to do. Make sure at least three or more people are playing, but do not include too many, lest the game become too crowded and difficult.

steps.headline: Tell the one who is "it" to close their eyes and count to a certain number.
steps.description: Ten is the most popular number used. When "it" is counting, this is the chance for the people hiding to go and hide. The "it" person must also count out loud.

steps.headline: Call out "Ready or not, here I come!"
steps.description: and seek the people hiding, if you are "it". The people hiding are allowed to move spots if found, as the game is slightly changed. The "it" must tag one of the people hiding in order for that person to be "it".

steps.headline: Find someone if you are "it".
steps.description: However, it's not recommended for the people hiding to continually change hiding spots, or the game will become unfair and hard for the "it" person. The person hiding is allowed to run if they are found by the "it" person.

steps.headline: Become "it" after being tagged by the "it".
steps.description: Like hide and seek, it's possible to cheat in Hide and Seek Tiggy. Cheating is either changing spots or using certain tactics to ensure you are never "it", but the ways to cheat will not be revealed on here.

steps.headline: Play as long as you want.
steps.description: This game has no time limit, and neither does hide and seek.

steps.headline: Have the "it" person count to twenty.
steps.description: The players must all hide at least 5 meters (16.4 ft) away from the "home base".

steps.headline: Begin the look for the hiders.
steps.description: The aim of the game is for the hiding players to return to home base without being tagged. Hiding players must run to the home base and say loudly "123 home base!". If a player gets tagged first, they're "it" next. If you're "it" next and you don't want to be, you must do 10 push ups or do the Harlem shake.
